about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Backend Developer with 20+ years of experience in embedded systems, cloud architecture, and video surveillance solutions. Currently serving as R&D Manager at VIVOTEK, leading development of cloud-based video surveillance platforms and smart home products.
about.paragraph2: Passionate about building scalable backend systems, exploring AWS services, and creating innovative IoT solutions. Former CTO at Infani, where I architected a comprehensive baby monitor service from firmware to cloud.

vivotek.description: Leading cloud-based video surveillance as a service (Vortex backend) and smart home product development using Golang, AWS services, and modern DevOps practices.

infani.description: Architected and developed comprehensive baby monitor service from firmware to cloud, including AI/ML for baby detection and sleep analysis. Managed full-stack development and DevOps infrastructure.

vivotekEarly.description: Progressed from Engineer to Deputy Manager, leading teams in network protocols, ONVIF, RTSP, P2P, and Video Content Analysis. Managed IP camera firmware development and intelligent video analytics.
